titles.title: Helping Our Middle-Class Entrepreneurs Act
HOME Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a standard home office deduction.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/27/2013--Introduced. Helping Our Middle-Class Entrepreneurs Act or the HOME Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a taxpayer who uses a residence to conduct a trade or business a standard tax deduction equal to the lesser of $1,500 or the taxpayer's gross trade or business income derived from the business use of such residence.
